Introduction

Hyesung is a South Korean singer under KLAP Entertainment. He is a member of the boy group VANNER.

On December 9, 2024, KLAP Entertainment announced that Hyesung had been admitted to a military hospital due to pre-existing panic and mental health disorders. On December 16, they announced that he was officially discharged from the military and would need to receive further treatment.
